programme.title: Jazz à Ramatuelle
programme.sub-title: Jazz à Ramatuelle: Kyle Eastwood Quintet
programme.desc: Bassist Kyle Eastwood (1968) is an explorer, equally at ease with jazz melodies as with pop songs. In the late 1970s, his father Clint took him to see his first jazz concert - a Count Basie performance. Eastwood Jr. was in awe of the drummer and wanted to play an instrument himself. It so happened he wasnt so much interested in jazz, preferring rhythm and blues, Motown and Stax records, funk groups, and North African and Indian music. Eastwood became a brilliant bassist and the composer of highly original soundtracks. His 2015 album "Time Pieces" is a collaboration with brilliant British musicians, such as trumpeter Quentin Collins and saxophonist Brandon Allen. In this broadcast, Eastwood and his fellow musicians revisit the hard bop legacy of Blue Note Records. Eastwood and his band perform original music, as well as songs made famous by Horace Silver and Herbie Hancock. Their contemporary take on Charles Mingus "Boogie Stop Shuffle" is not to be missed!

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: The Morgenland Festival
programme.desc: Since 2005, the Morgenland Festival of Osnabrueck has dedicated itself to the fascinating music culture of the Near and Middle East. From traditional and classical music to avant-garde, jazz, and rock, the festival program also features art, such as visual arts, dance, and theatre of interdisciplinary projects. The Morgenland Chamber Orchestra has been an integral part of the Morgenland Festival since 2009. This ensemble of musicians from Germany and various guest countries performs as part of the festivals opening concert. This episode includes performances sometimes energetic, sometimes soft and soothing.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Kurhaus Scheveningen
programme.desc: The Dutch world-class jazz pianist Peter Beets has shared the stage with jazz greats like Chick Corea, Wynton Marsalis, "Toots" Thielemans, Elvin Jones, George Coleman, Johnny Griffin, Benny Golson and John Clayton. From birth, Beets was surrounded by music: he heard classical music from his mother, who is a music pedagogue, and he heard jazz from his father, who has a great fan of Oscar Peterson and Art Blakey. Although Beets parents originally did not associate the word "musician" with the word "career", music is definitely in the familys blood. At this concert at the Kurhaus in Scheveningen, the Netherlands, Peter Beets teams up with the world-famous guitarist Kurt Rosenwinkel. With a career spanning almost twenty-five years and including collaborating with dynamic peers like Brad Mehldau, Brian Blade, Mark Turner, Joshua Redman, Chris Potter, as well as esteemed jazz legends like Joe Henderson, Paul Motian and Gary Burton, Rosenwinkels indelible mark in music is the consummation of being steeped in the rich and deep traditions of jazz, springing off of the shoulders of such vital underpinnings to elevate his own art to new heights, evolving the language in a way no other guitarist has since his arrival. This collaboration between Beets and Rosenwinkel guarantees brilliant music.

programme.title: John Coltrane
programme.desc: The mere mention of the name John Coltrane evokes a deeply emotional, often spiritual response from even the most casual jazz fan. Dexter Gordon was a fantastic saxophonist. Miles Davis was a genius. Coltrane stood above - he was a visionary, a saint-like figure. By the standards of most jazz musicians, his life was uneventful. Sure, he had a heroin habit for a while, and Miles Davis punched him, but once hed experienced the "spiritual awakening" described in the liner notes of his 1965 album A Love Supreme, he dedicated himself to his music with extreme single-mindedness. This broadcast of Coltranes 1965 performance at the short-lived Belgian jazz festival in Comblain-la-Tour features Tranes classic quartet with Elvin Jones (drums), Jimmy Garrison (bass) and McCoy Tyner (piano).

programme.title: Chick Corea and Gary Burton - Munchner Klaviersommer
programme.desc: "Munchner Klaviersommer" was an annual concerts series that took place from 1981 to 1998 in Munich, Germany. Although the festivals name suggests a strong focus on piano music, it featured countless famous musicians from jazz and classical music - not just pianists. The concerts were usually held in July at The Gasteig, home of the Munich Philharmonic. In 1997, American pianist Armando Anthony "Chick" Corea was one of the artists appearing here. He performed a set with longtime duet partner, vibraphonist Gary Burton. This concert was a reunion of sorts for the two, who had not appeared as a duo for many years, and the first of many more joint performances to come. Today, both musicians have more than earned their jazz legend status.

programme.title: Live at the Metro Theatre
programme.desc: The Australian-born singer-songwriter Sia Kate Isobelle Furler, simply known as Sia, is one of the most unique artists in todays popular music scene. However, her path to stardom has been nothing but rocky. Only after numerous musical experimentations, where the singer tried to establish herself in her home country as well as United Kingdom, Sia finally blossomed in United States around the second decade of the 21st century. The very beginnings of her mainstream recognition was captured on 25 March 2009, where the artist performed live at Metro Theatre in Sydney, Australia.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: If Only
programme.desc: Raul Midon appeared at 2017s Sing Jazz Festival in Singapore with double bassist Romeir Mendez and drummer Billy Williams. Blind since birth, Raul Midon is a singer, guitarist, and songwriter from New Mexico. With a vocal range as dynamic as his guitar playing and a remarkable talent for trumpet mimicry, Midons performances transcend musical boundaries, effortlessly blending rock, jazz, folk, and Latin pop into his unique sound. He has worked with numerous legends, including Bill Withers, Herbie Hancock, Sting, and Dianne Reeves, and his album "Bad Ass and Blind" was nominated for a Grammy Award for Best Jazz Vocal Album in 2018. No wonder the Sing Jazz audience were ecstatic!

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Chamber Music
programme.desc: Hailing from a long tradition of Malian kora players, Ballake Sissoko has worked with renowned musicians such as Toumani Diabate and Taj Mahal. He met the French born Vincent Segal by chance, and the two began jamming together, uncertain of what kind of music might result. As a former member of the French National Orchestra, Segals Western classical training does not prevent him from exploring a wide variety of extended techniques, rendering his cello a flexible partner to Sissokos kora. A childhood spent in the Pigalle district of Paris surrounded by immigrant communities exposed Segal to African music from an early age. As such, he possesses a natural sensitivity to Sissokos West-African style. The concert shows a brilliant interplay between the two musicians and combines the several worlds of jazz, Malian and classical music.

programme.title: Les McCann
programme.sub-title: Les McCann: Live in New Orleans
programme.desc: Autodidact Les McCann became an international jazz star he is today after the release of his album "Swiss Movement" in 1968 which was recorded with Eddie Harris. However this musician has many other sides of achievements than that one record such as; McCann effortlessly switched between styles and stood his ground in every role from bop to fusion, from vocals to electric piano and clavinet to synthesizer, his is mix of church music and swing fits perfectly in the spirit of his time although at one point within the 90s he was only able to play with a single finger due to his illness. In todays broadcast, McCann brings gospel back to the New Orleans where this set was played in 1983. McCanns vocals triumph in the soulful performance of many of his hits, including Just Like Magic. He is accompanied by his fantastic "Magic Band" consisting of saxophonist Bobby Bryant Jr., bassist Curtis Roberson Jr. and drummer Tony St. James.

programme.title: Portrait of Roy Ayers
programme.desc: "The legend of the groove" is a series of documentaries devoted to the musicians who were most influential on contemporary hip hop, soul, rhythm n blues, and on the course of history. Between the late 1950s and now, these musicians radically changed music. Although sometimes hardly in the public eye, they have all been major sources of inspiration for todays major artists: Prince, Erykah Badu, Janis Joplin and Jimi Hendrix.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Popa Chubby _Its a Mighty Hard Road
programme.desc: Popa Chubby, born as Ted Horowitz, is an American blues singer and guitarist, who has become one of the most popular figures of New Yorks blues scene. Early on in his career he released the album "Booty and the Beast" (1995), which became one of the 1990ss best-selling blues albums. Chubby describes his own style as "The Stooges meets Buddy Guy, Motorhead meets Muddy Waters, and Jimi Hendrix meets Robert Johnson". As part of the French music festival Blues sur Seine, Chubby and his band played a great blues rock concert, showcasing the artists powerful and soulful guitar playing. This performance was recorded at Theâtre Simone Signoret on November 8, 2019.

programme.title: Da Pá Virada Sessions
programme.desc: The Da Pá Virada Sessions series presents the best musicians of contemporary Brazilian jazz, and beyond. Filmed in Sao Paulo, each session offers a unique experience by giving a fresh look into Brazils music scene. The artists for each session are selected in consultation with Stingray DJAZZs music editor. One of the bands taking part in this series is Os Capoeira. This ensemble practices the traditional Brazilian martial art from Bahia it is named after, combining elements of dance, acrobatics, and percussive music. Moreover, Os Capoeira runs a cultural center in Sao Paulo. Let yourself be inspired by Os Capoeiras unique take on Brazilian culture!

programme.title: Lucky Chops - Live at BIRD
programme.desc: The NYC band Lucky Chops rose to fame when a video of their performance at a subway station went viral on YouTube in 2015. Since then, the energetic quintet has been entertaining audiences all over the world. The band was formed in 2006, when trumpeter Joshua Gawel, saxophonist Daro Behroozi, trombonist Josh Holcomb, tubist Raphael Buyo, and drummer Charles Sams, met during their education at Fiorello H. LaGuardia High School of Music and Art and Performing Arts. Besides touring globally, Lucky Chops also aspires to inspire new generations of musicians by regularly performing at clinics and educational outreaches. In August 2018, they performed their high-energy brassy funk at BIRD, in Rotterdam.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. Back in 1982, legendary jazz clarinettist Benny Goodman performed at the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague with his septet. The "King of Swing" revisited the atmosphere of the 1930s, when jazz enjoyed tremendous popularity.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1979, legendary big band leader and pianist Count Basie brought his famous big band to the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague to perform two sets. Basie, whose minimalist pianism and blues-oriented swing style had cemented his popularity as early as the 1930s, was in the midst of a European tour and had recorded his live album On the Road the previous night in Montreux, Switzerland. Here is the first of two sets recorded at the festival in 1979.

programme.title: Internationale Jazzwoche Burghausen
programme.desc: Every year since 1970, the German city of Burghausen has been hosting one of the largest jazz festivals in the world. During Burghausen International Jazz Week, Burghausen becomes a Bavarian jazz mecca: guests from all over the world join the Burghausers to enjoy the most wonderful jazz performances as the colorful hustle and bustle of spectators and musicians shake up the city. One of the artists performing here in 2019 is Etienne Mbappe. This talented Cameroonian bassist and singer songwriter Etienne Mbappe surrounds himself with upcoming jazz talent from Paris in his band The Prophets. Their extremely melodic music is full of soulful, spirited grooves.

programme.title: Belgium Sessions
programme.desc: In this DJAZZ Belgium Sessions performance, which was recorded at AED Studios in Lint, Belgium, we witness Europes finest jazz musicians at work. A wide variety of international jazz musicians give a creative, up-close and inside insight into their art of playing jazz music. Young talent and established jazz musicians play to their hearts content: take for instance this unusual performance by the Free Desmyter Quartet. Desmyter is an obstinate improviser with a very original and recognisable sound. His compositions are never contrived, nor revolutionary, for that matter, yet they are contemporary and innovative.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. Back in 1981, legendary American singer James Brown gave an unforgettable performance at the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. The "Godfather of Soul", "Mr. Dynamite", and "Soul Brother No. 1" was a major force in 20th century popular music, influencing many musicians in numerous genres.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: The Morgenland Festival
programme.desc: Since 2005, the Morgenland Festival of Osnabrueck has dedicated itself to the fascinating music culture of the Near and Middle East. From traditional and classical music to avant-garde, jazz, and rock, the festival program also features art, such as visual arts, dance, and theatre of interdisciplinary projects. "The Art of Duo" presents an unprecedented duo featuring pianist Salman Gambarov and sheng player, a Chinese mouth-organ, Wu Wei.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Sarah Vaughn
programme.desc: Sarah, Sassy, the Divine One... the incomparable Sarah Vaughan. Sarah Vaughan - The Divine One recounts the stellar singers career from her beginnings at the Mt. Zion Baptist Church in Newark, New Jersey, to her debut at the Apollo Theater and her pre-eminence in nightclubs, concert halls and jazz festivals around the world. Packed with live performances spanning her entire career, Sarah Vaughan - The Divine One offers a portrait of a woman who was professionally unparalleled. Colleagues, contemporaries and relatives, including Billy Eckstine, Roy Haynes, Joe Williams, Marty Paich, George Gaffney, Sarahs mother Ada, and her daughter Paris, offer their first-hand perspectives.

programme.title: Jungle By Night - Jazz in Duketown
programme.desc: Jazz in Duketown is the largest free outdoor jazz festival in the Netherlands. Its a real gathering for jazz addicts, inviting internationally renowned bands. In 2019, one of them is the Amsterdam-based Dutch instrumental collective Jungle by Night. The band plays a mix of various styles, inspired by funk, jazz, dub, rock and others. The ensemble made its debut in 2010 and has played at numerous festivals. Their December 2010 performance with former backing musicians of Afrobeat founder Fela Kuti in Paris saw them hailed as "the future of Afrobeat".

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Face au public
programme.desc: Legendary African-American folk singer Odetta (1930-2008) sang her spirituals with immeasurable sorrow and anguish. Her spiritual music expresses the horrific impact of slavery on millions of African people stolen from their homeland. For Odetta, folk music—be it spirituals, blues or field songs—was a vehicle for expressing the racism and injustice experienced by black people dating back to the days of slavery. This 1964 episode of Face au Public shows the melancholy of the era.

programme.title: Wes Montgomery - Heres that rainy day
programme.desc: This selection of unforgettable performances by some of the most iconic and influential jazz guitarists in history showcases these legends unique essence. Revel in Wes Montgomerys virtuosity as he performs the captivating "Nicas Dream" in Holland in 1965, and delight in the expressive beauty of his rendition of "Heres That Rainy Day", recorded in London in that same year. Experience the timeless appeal of Joe Passs "You Stepped Out of a Dream" and "You Turned The Tables on Me", recorded live in Hanover in 1975. The interplay between Jim Hall and Atilla Zoller borders on the impossible as they perform "Extensions" in Hanover in 1973. Enjoy Jim Halls lyrical solo performance of "Im Getting Sentimental Over You" from 1964. Witness Sonny Sharrocks avant-garde fusion of jazz and rock in an exhilarating performance of "Peanut", recorded live in France in 1970. Sharrock is joined by flutist Herbie Mann in a soulful performance of "Memphis Underground" from 1969. Immerse yourself in the magic of jazz guitar!

programme.title: For Heavens Sake
programme.desc: The Newport Jazz Festival, first established in the North-American town of Newport, Rhode Island in the summer of 1954, has now grown to become one of the largest multi-day celebrations of jazz worldwide. It has resulted in numerous famous live albums from top-rate jazz stars, and has spawned several worldwide tours, including editions of the Newport Jazz Festival in Rotterdam, The Netherlands. In October 1968, two former colleagues met again on stage, this time leading their own bands at the Newport Jazz Festival in Rotterdam: drummer Art Blakey and pianist Horace Silver were both co-founders of The Jazz Messengers.

programme.title: WOMEX 2018
programme.desc: Since 1994, World Music Expo (WOMEX) has been attracting musicians, agents, a great number of press agencies, as well as media companies from all over the world. Its main exposition event has been held in various locations throughout Europe, including Berlin, Brussels, Marseille, Stockholm, Seville, Cardiff, and Budapest. In 2018, WOMEX was held in Las Palmas, Gran Canaria. One of its showcase participants, Ladama, is a quintet of women multi-instrumentalists from Venezuela, Brazil, Colombia and the United States who not only perform as a touring band, but also strive to engage youth in their respective communities in the process of musicmaking, composition and audio production through collaboration and performance workshops. Ladama is a positive force in times urgently in need of tolerance and communication.

programme.title: Sazz Leonore sings Michael Buble
programme.desc: With her relaxed, smooth voice, vocalist Sazz Leonore has made her name on the Dutch jazz scene. The vocalist grew up in a family of jazz fans: from a very early age, she developed a fondness for the music of Ella Fitzgerald, Billie Holiday, and others. Sazz Leonore knows how to transport her audience to the music of the 1960s, while putting her own, contemporary stamp on her music. In this concert, which was recorded at Amsterdams North Sea Jazz Club, the vocalist salutes one of her idols: the Canadian vocalist Michael Buble. The combination of Sazzs smooth voice, her solid band, and the timeless repertoire of her famous Canadian idol guarantee a wonderful evening!

programme.title: Sammy Davis Jr. - Concertgebouw Amsterdam
programme.desc: The Royal Concertgebouw in Amsterdam is a world-renowned concert hall, known for its first-rate acoustics. It has attracted many famous performers over the years and is one of the Netherlands most treasured musical institutions. On May 28, 1967, American singer and actor Sammy Davis Jr. appeared at the Concertgebouw in Amsterdam for a live, nationwide TV broadcast. Supported by his band conducted by George Rhodes, Davis Jr. combined his singing talent and infectious sense of humor as he covered songs from a variety of genres.

programme.title: The Hammond© Sessions
programme.desc: The Dutch Hammond organ player Rob Mostert develops, in cooperation with DJAZZ, the programme Mostert Meets. In this series, the Hammond B3 organ takes centre stage. Rob Mostert invites the worlds finest jazz musicians for a musical collaboration, in which the Hammond Organ plays a major role. The Hammond B3 is an electric organ, which generates sound by creating an electric current from rotating a metal tonewheel near an electromagnetic pickup. Initially, the Hammond B3 was at home in churches, until it entered the jazz scene in the mid-20th century. In this episode, Mostert joins forces with the Australian Hammond organ player Lachy Doley and his regular band. Doley is considered one of the best blues, soul and rock organ players, nicknamed "the Jimi Hendrix of the Hammond organ".

programme.title: 29th Street Saxophone Quartet
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. The 29th Street Saxophone Quartet is an American quartet founded in 1982 by alto saxophonists Bobby Watson and Ed Jackson, tenor saxophonist Rich Rothenberg and baritone saxophonist Jim Hartog. The band has an eclectic repertoire ranging from jazz to show, funk, rap, and experimental music.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1989, legendary jazz pianist Ahmad Jamal brought his trio to the North Sea Jazz Festival. Accompanied by James Cammack on bass and David Bowler on drums, Jamal showcased his excellence.

programme.title: Seine Sessions
programme.desc: The term "jam-session" was born in the 1920s, when black and white musicians gathered in smoke-filled bars after their respective concerts to enjoy the kind of jazz they could not play in traditional sets. Bing Crosby was a regular at these sessions, and had fun marking the first and third beats of musical phrases by clapping hands, which the musicians call "jammin the beat". Today, the Seine Sessions revive the happy years of "jam sessions", while the cream of jazz, blues, gipsy and funk Parisian scenes occurs on the boards of the legendary restaurant and jazz club Le Reservoir. Entitled "Free and Afro Jazz," this episode hosted by Eddy King features unique performances by artists playing together for the first time, and interviews with Fantazio, Eddy Lopez, Banoit Savard, and many others.

programme.title: The Morgenland Festival
programme.sub-title: The Morgenland Festival: I Will Not Be Sad
programme.desc: Since 2005, the Morgenland Festival, held in Osnabrueck, has dedicated itself to the fascinating music culture of the Near and Middle East. From traditional and classical music to avant-garde, jazz, and rock, the festival program also features art, such as visual arts, dance, and theatre of interdisciplinary projects. Jivan Gasparyan Jr has always been inspired by the folk melodies of his native Armenia. His grandfather, also a musician, taught him the art of duduk, an instrument of Armenian origin.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Burton and Ozone - Munchner Klaviersommer
programme.desc: "Munchner Klaviersommer" was an annual concerts series that took place from 1981 to 1998 in Munich, Germany. Although the festivals name suggests a strong focus on piano music, it featured countless famous musicians from jazz and classical music - not just pianists. The concerts were usually held in July at The Gasteig, home of the Munich Philharmonic. In 1995, vibraphonist Gary Burton and pianist Makoto Ozone, both great jazz players noted for their virtuoso technique and innovative style, came together to give a concert of improvised music. They delighted the audience with their fluid, poetic artistry, which was expressed in a performance of the highest order.

programme.title: The Tallberg Foundation
programme.sub-title: The Tallberg Foundation: "Jazz for the Planet"
programme.desc: On October 19, 2021, John Patitucci (bass), Marco Pignataro (sax and musical director), and Joe Lovano (sax) showcased inspirational new originals at GBHs Fraser Performance Studio in Boston, MA, accompanied by Terri Lyne Carrington (drums), Nadia Washington (vocals), Chico Pinheiro (guitar), and Anastassiya Petrova (piano). This recording, titled Tallbergs Jazz for the Planet, was made in support of the Tallberg Foundations message and aims to inspire positive climate action. Since 1981, the Tallberg Foundation has been trying to nurture new thinking, in part by looking at societal challenges through the lenses of artists.

programme.title: Charles Mingus And Eric Dolphy live in Liège
programme.desc: Charles Mingus showcases an exceptional concert performed in April 1965 featuring his most celebrated lineup: Jaki Byard (piano), Dannie Richmond (drums), Johnny Coles (trumpet), Clifford Jordan (tenor sax) and the great Eric Dolphy (alto sax, flute and bass clarinet). Recorded within an eight-day span, less than three months before Dolphys death, the three concerts showcase Minguss visionary leadership and the bands incredible depth and diversity with unique performances and arrangements of classics including "So Long Eric" and the groundbreaking Meditations On Integration.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Patáx
programme.desc: Patáx was heavily influenced by seminal fusion bands like Weather Report and Return to Forever. Dont mistake this Spanish powerhouse for a carbon copy of either, however, as Patáx presents an accomplished mix of styles, including soul, jazz, funk and hip-hop. The group is led by the passionate Spanish-American percussionist Jorge Perez, who draws his musical influence from both sides of the Atlantic. The tight interplay between Perez and his bandmates as well as the audiences enthusiasm at Teatro Calderon in Madrid make it a night to remember. This is the second of two parts.

programme.title: Hall and Oates - Live at Sydney Entertainment Centre
programme.desc: When Daryl Hall and John Oates took to the stage at Sydneys Entertainment Centre as the iconic bass line of "Maneater" began to play, the fans knew they were in for a treat. This duo may have been opening concerts with that irresistibly smooth number for years, but it never seems to lose its magic, and the crowd - an eclectic mix of teens and baby boomers alike - lapped it up. Daryl Hall and John Oates wisely reunited a few years ago after a string of solo projects, and although Oates no longer sports his signature tache, they put on the kind of show that makes it hard to believe they even considered going their separate ways. Earworms like I Cant Go For That, "Out Of Touch" and "Kiss On My List" were surefire reminders that these guys are absolute hit machines, and their catchy synth-soul classics probably deserve to permeate the airwaves as much today as they did decades ago. These Philly crooners still have it in bucket-loads, so this show should have everyone from diehard Daryl Hall and John Oates fans to kids of the 80s groovin along in no time.

programme.title: Mike Stern and Didier Lockwood
programme.sub-title: Mike Stern and Didier Lockwood: Jazz à Vienne
programme.desc: Guitarist Mike Stern and violin player Didier Lockwood sharing a stage: that promises a good show! After playing for years with Blood, Sweat and Tears, Mike Stern landed a gig with drummer Billy Cobham and then broke through with Miles Davis comeback band in the 1980s. Didier Lockwood played in jazz fusion band Magma during the 1970s and is known for his use of electric amplification and experimentation. Together they perform a unique duo concert at the beautiful antique theatre in Vienne, France.

programme.title: Rebirth
programme.desc: Amsterdam, February 6th, 2018 - The short documentary Rebirth in The Amsterdam Red Light District illustrates how brutal Richard Lems life as an addict was and his struggle to unshackle himself from the shame. Filled with fierce, freighting, and sad moments, Richard relives his stabbing, stay in jail, drug test, and drug use. Richard expresses himself verbally but mainly relives the moments through drumming, which renders the documentary an intense and unique experience. Addiction doctor and musician Gerard Alderliefste: "If he dares to bottom out, he will see it was the drugs and not himself. Music can bring those emotions to the surface".

programme.title: Fine and Mellow
programme.desc: "God Bless The Child", "Foolin Myself", and "I Loves You, Porgy": timeless songs that were made classics by the inimitable Billie Holiday. Lady Day, as her loyal friend and musical partner Lester Young nicknamed her, was a highly original jazz and pop singer. In a career that spanned most of the 1930s, 1940s and 1950s, she displayed an uncanny ability to convey emotion through her voice. Her vocals, which were strongly inspired by instrumental jazz, are admired for their deeply personal and intimate sound. This compilation features recordings from the 1950s of Billie Holiday singing a string of her greatest successes. Enjoy this unique footage of one of jazzs all-time greats!

programme.title: Build a New World
programme.desc: The Newport Jazz Festival, first established in the North-American town of Newport, Rhode Island in the summer of 1954, has now grown to become one of the largest multi-day celebrations of jazz worldwide. It has resulted in numerous famous live albums from top-rate jazz stars, and has spawned several worldwide tours, including editions of the Newport Jazz Festival in Rotterdam, The Netherlands. In October 1968, two former colleagues met again on stage, this time leading their own bands at the Newport Jazz Festival in Rotterdam: drummer Art Blakey and pianist Horace Silver were both co-founders of The Jazz Messengers.

programme.title: Paradox Live
programme.sub-title: Paradox Live: Vein ft. Greg Osby
programme.desc: Innovative contemporary jazz and improvised music, the search for modernity, mind blowing sounds, rock and pop… Indeed PARADOX Tilburg goes beyond jazz, crossing musical boundaries into the unknown soundscapes of electronic music. Indie artists, blues veterans and jazz superstars all pour their hearts and souls at the Paradox. From young, local talents to top national and international artists, PARADOX Tilburg is the most intimate jazz club in the Netherlands, with a devoted audience from all across Europe. In their TV show PARADOX LIVE you get a taste of the greatest concerts and interviews with artists from all around the world. This episode of PARADOX LIVE presents the Swiss jazz band VEIN accompanied by saxophone player Greg Osby.

programme.title: Jeroen van Vliet
programme.sub-title: Jeroen van Vliet: Zeeland Suite Revisited
programme.desc: 1977 saw the recording of an audiovisual project that was hitherto unparalleled in Dutch jazz and television history: the Zeeland Suite. Pianist Leo Cuypers composed this suite, parts of which were recorded for television on different locations in the Dutch province of Zeeland. A 7-piece band, featuring Willem Breuker and members of his Kollektief, performed Cuypers music. The combination of live music and epic footage, some of which was filmed from a helicopter, was the basis for a 50-minute television broadcast. Jeroen van Vliets "Zeeland Suite Revisited" is an updated version of this remarkable project. Pianist Jeroen van Vliet, 2014s Boy Edgar Prize winner, composed new music. Using a new band - and new technology: drones - this new project once again shows the beauty of Zeeland. Todays band features many big names from the contemporary Dutch jazz scene, gathered to pay tribute to Zeelands characteristic landscape.

programme.title: Aki Rissanen Trio at Jazzclub Unterfahrt, Munich
programme.desc: Aki Rissanens interest in jazz came after he started taking classical piano lessons. His deep interest in improvised music placed him among top jazz pianist in his home country - Finland. While composing and performing his own music, Rissanen has also collaborated with Verneri Pohjola and Dave Liebman, and today his name appears among the top European jazz musicians. Live from "Jazzclub Unterfahrt" in Munich, Germany, together with Antti Lotjonen on bass and Teppo Makynen on drums, Rissanen showcases the best of Scandinavian jazz and its DNA - the Nordic Tone.

programme.title: Travellin Blues
programme.desc: Jazz en Baie, a whining guitar sound, and the baritone voice of Big Daddy Wilson are the perfect recipe for an emotional and melancholy blues concert. As a young man, Big Daddy Wilson never saw a real blues concert before he walked into a Bremen club as a young soldier. This revelation drove the expatriate to throw himself head over heals into music. A few decades and a couple of studio albums later, hes well-known as one of the greatest contemporary bluesmen: his baritone voice, of a rare emotional power, recounts the nostalgic stories of his native land. His album Im Your Man brought him his first international success. Always respectful of the blues roots he inherited, the charismatic singer adds soul, funk, country and gospel to his musical range; the memories of his American youth.

programme.title: WOMEX 2018
programme.desc: Since 1994, World Music Expo (WOMEX) has been attracting musicians, agents, a great number of press agencies, as well as media companies from all over the world. Its main exposition event has been held in various locations throughout Europe, including Berlin, Brussels, Marseille, Stockholm, Seville, Cardiff, and Budapest. In 2018, WOMEX was held in Las Palmas, Gran Canaria. One of its participating bands, Invisible World, is based at the jazz crossroads where East European and Mediterranean influences merge and caper off in new directions. Led by Czech bassist Tomáš Liška, a prolific idea man of many projects, joined by Turkish violinist Efe Turumtay, Serbian accordionist Nikola Zarić and Moravian drummer Kamil Slezák.

programme.title: Sammy Price and the Harlem Beggars
programme.desc: Pianist, singer and civil rights activist Sammy Price is joined by the gospel singers known as the Harlem Beggars for spirited renditions of "Go Tell It on the Mountain," "Im a Soldier," and "When the Saints Go Marching In," among several others. The group is joined by Wilbert Harrison, who provides accompaniment on organ.

programme.title: Belgium Sessions
programme.desc: In this DJAZZ.tv Belgium Sessions performance, which was recorded at AED Studios in Lint, Belgium, we witness Europes finest jazz musicians at work. A wide variety of international jazz musicians give a creative, up-close and inside insight into their art of playing jazz music. Young talent and established jazz musicians play to their hearts content: take for instance this unusual performance by Saxkartel. This band plays jazz and modern music with an uncommon approach: as a saxophone quartet, they perform chamber-like music without the accompaniment of a rhythm section. Their approach is similar to that of the classical string quartet, but their choice of repertoire clearly sets them apart: they play pure jazz!

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1988, acclaimed Brazilian singer and pianist Tania Maria performed with bassist Leonard Traversa and drummer Kim Plainfield at the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. Maria is known for her energetic personality and unique style of singing that draws from a variety of jazz, Latin and pop traditions.

programme.title: Kurt Rosenwinkel meets Peter Beets Trio
programme.desc: The Dutch world-class jazz pianist Peter Beets has shared the stage with jazz greats like Chick Corea, Wynton Marsalis, "Toots" Thielemans, Elvin Jones, George Coleman, Johnny Griffin, Benny Golson and John Clayton. From birth, Beets was surrounded by music: he heard classical music from his mother, who is a music pedagogue, and he heard jazz from his father, who has a great fan of Oscar Peterson and Art Blakey. Although Beets parents originally did not associate the word "musician" with the word "career", music is definitely in the familys blood. At this concert at the Kurhaus in Scheveningen, the Netherlands, Peter Beets teams up with the world-famous guitarist Kurt Rosenwinkel. With a career spanning almost twenty-five years and including collaborating with dynamic peers like Brad Mehldau, Brian Blade, Mark Turner, Joshua Redman, Chris Potter, as well as esteemed jazz legends like Joe Henderson, Paul Motian and Gary Burton, Rosenwinkels indelible mark in music is the consummation of being steeped in the rich and deep traditions of jazz, springing off of the shoulders of such vital underpinnings to elevate his own art to new heights, evolving the language in a way no other guitarist has since his arrival. This collaboration between Beets and Rosenwinkel guarantees brilliant music.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Internationale Jazzwoche Burghausen
programme.desc: Every year since 1970, the German city of Burghausen has been hosting one of the largest jazz festivals in the world. During Burghausen International Jazz Week, Burghausen becomes a Bavarian jazz mecca: guests from all over the world join the Burghausers to enjoy the most wonderful jazz performances as the colorful hustle and bustle of spectators and musicians shake up the city. Among the artists of 2019 is the German Leo Betzl Trio. These three gentlemen make up one of the few acoustic trios to experiment with techno jazz. Despite relying on the traditional piano, double bass and percussion format, their sound is highly inventive and totally now.

programme.title: Larry Graham
programme.sub-title: Larry Graham: Ultimate Funk at the Bataclan
programme.desc: This recording brings a great performance by Larry Graham and Graham Central Station from the intimate Trianon in Paris. Six hundred "funkateers" came together to cheer the bass player and funk hero. In the sixties, Graham was mainly known for his work with Sly and the Family Stone, the popular and influential psychedelic soul and funk band. As founder and front man of Graham Central Station he has also enjoyed a successful solo career. It is often said that Graham pioneered the art of slap-pop playing on the electric bass, which has become a staple of modern funk. During this Paris performance, Graham shows he is one of the heroes of funk!

programme.title: Jazz à Vienne 2017 Jamie Cullum
programme.desc: Watch the performance of Jamie Cullum live at Jazz à Vienne, in 2017.

programme.title: Estival Jazz Lugano
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. The composer, trumpeter and bugle player Franco Ambrosetti performs with his quintet in his native Lugano as part of the Estival.

programme.title: Tribute to Django Reinhardt
programme.sub-title: Tribute to Django Reinhardt: Rosenberg meets Beets
programme.desc: World-class Dutch jazz pianist Peter Beets has shared the stage with jazz greats Chick Corea, Wynton Marsalis, "Toots" Thielemans, Elvin Jones, George Coleman, Johnny Griffin, Benny Golson, and John Clayton. His mother a music teacher and his father an Oscar Peterson and Art Blakey enthusiast, Beets was surrounded by music from an early age. And though music was in their blood, neither parent associated the word "musician" with a career. In this broadcast, Peter Beets teams up with gipsy jazz heros Stochelo Rosenberg, Martin Limberger and Frans van Geest. The strength and precision of Van Geests rhythms and tempo, and the ease with which Stochelos lead guitar soars above them, make this band a cohesive collective - unique in their renditions of standards, Djangos classic compositions, and original tunes composed by Stochelo himself.

programme.title: Jimmy Witherspoon Quartet and Rozaa Wortham 1985
programme.desc: Estival has been an annual jazz festival since 1977 and takes place in the Italian speaking part of Switzerland named Lugano. Estival offers an exhilarating and especially a surprising line-up that focuses in a particular world of modern music with rich sounds. At Estival, promoting the splendor, tolerance and existence between different cultures is supreme. Hereby Jimmy Witherspoon and Rozaa Wortham, two exceptionally special jazz musicians. Rozaa Wortham kicks off with the Jimmy Witherspoon Quartet. Swinging and energetic she sings It Dont Mean A Thing. Jimmy Witherspoon, known for the song Aint Nobodys Business, starts his performance with pleasant layed-back blues.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Kenny Barron, Calypso
programme.desc: Pianist Kenny Barrons June 27, 2019 appearance at the Alfa Jazz Festival in Ukraines Lviv was a celebration of sublime jazz virtuosity. The revered elder statesmen of jazz piano brought his regular working trio of Kiyoshi Kitagawa (bass) and Jonathan Blake (drums), augmented by stellar jazzman Marcus Strickland (tenor saxophone) and young lion Riley Mulherkar (trumpet). Their seamless blend of classic bebop and modern explorations spoke of a deep, emotive connection to each note, captivating the Ukrainian audience with lyrical improvisations during this unforgettable concert.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1987, smooth jazz saxophonist and crowd-favorite Kenny G serenaded those attending the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. After beginning his career in the Love Unlimited Orchestra, he now brings his own band for this hypnotic performance.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Miami CSI meeskonda juhib pommiekspert Horatio Caine. Temaga koos teostavad uurimisi ballistik ja relvaekspert Calleigh Duquesne ja raamatukoi Tim Speedle, kes tunneb Miami tanavaid nagu oma taskuid. programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Omanaoline kohtingusaade, kus valik tehakse aeglaselt paljastuvate alasti kehade põhjal.

programme.title: Valelikud võrgutajad
programme.desc: Valelikud võrgutajad naasevad viis aastat parast lõpetamist Rosewoodi, sest Alison palub neil anda tunnistusi Charlotte vabastamiseks.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Sophie saabub villasse paaride umberjagamise tseremooniale. Üks saareline saadetakse koju.

programme.title: Majajahtijad
programme.desc: Paar otsib endale esimest paris oma kodu Californias Glendaleis. Parast maja leidmist kaarivad nad kaised ules ja alustavad remonti, kuid nende vintage kodus on pinna all peidus palju vintage probleeme.

programme.title: Pilvede all
programme.desc: Kurb sundmus on perekonna kokku toonud ning leinaval Sirjel on oma kolmele tutrele nii mõndagi oelda. Piret kiidab heaks Kertu otsuse perega Rootsi jaada, kuid Mari pereelu seis jaab mõlemale mõistatuseks. Maimu puuab Eriku sudametunnistust aratada, kuid mees ei taha Liinast ega lapsest kuuldagi. Inna leiab seltsi ja mõtteklaaslase Urmase naol ning Gunnar ei varjagi, kellele tema suda tegelikult loob.

programme.title: Vana silla saladus
programme.desc: Elsa avastab Antolina saladuse. Don Anselmo julgustab Isaaci. Julieta jaab Fernandole vahele.

programme.title: Esmakohtingute hotell
programme.desc: Stacey on tudinenud pahadest poistest ning laheb kohtingule meditsiinitarvikuid muuva Pauliga, kes ullatab teda oma peenetundelisusega. Muusik Jonathan otsib omale muusat. Reece puuab võluda energilist Chelsead, kuid punane vein ja austrid ei too talle edu.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Rosei unistused saavad hoo sisse. Roo on otsustanud Eliza tulevikku kujundama hakata. Kas Mali jaab valega vahele?

programme.title: Poissmees
programme.desc: Clayton puuab olla vahemeheks Shanae ja Elizabethi tulis. Seltskonna grillipeole paneb punkti kantriband Restless Road. Saate erikulalised on Jonathan Greenard ja Kamu Grugier-Hill.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: New Hampshirei pere võidab lotoga miljon dollarit ja saab viimaks võimaluse soetada endale paris oma maja. David aitab neil leida kõige mõnusamat maamaja.

programme.title: Kevad sudames
programme.desc: Katja on Cemi peale pahane ja kurvastab Kiki arasõidu parast. Mark otsustab talle Fruhlingisse seltsiks jaada. Peagi saab Katja uue too, kus ta naeb pereelu murgitavaid probleeme ja otsustab Bredemeyereid aidata ka muus peale kodutoode. Peale selle kaebab Kiki talle Peeti peale ja Katja asub ka poisi moraali tõstma.

programme.title: Kevad sudames
programme.desc: Katja tegeleb kogu hingest Bredemeyerite aitamisega, sest paistab, et kõigil pereliikmetel on omad probleemid, kuni avastab Matthiase saladuse. Mark saab uue abilise.

programme.title: Gurmeedetektiiv
programme.desc: Politseiuurija Maggie Price ja kulinaariaekspert Henry Ross uurivad Henry hea sõbra kahtlast surmajuhtumit. Oma koogis elutult leitud mehe surma asjaolude uurimine vallandab aga ohtliku sundmusteahela, mis ahvardab saatuslikuks saada nii Henry ja Maggie karjaarile kui ka nende tarkavale suhtele.

programme.title: Sõbrad
programme.desc: Tuutu naaber Heckles jatab surres kogu oma vara Monicale ja Rachelile. Chandler avastab, et tema elu sarnaneb liigagi palju veidra Hecklesi omaga.

programme.title: Reede ÕHTU!
programme.desc: Õhtu meeskond eesotsas saatejuhtide Pireti, Juri ja Robiga muudavad nadalavahetuse eelõhtud veelgi mangulisemaks, poorasemaks ja lõbusamaks. Reede ÕHTU! paneb toonadalale lustlikult punkti ja juhatab meeleolukalt sisse nadalavahetuse.

programme.title: Esmakohtingute hotell
programme.desc: Suhteguru Breeny on ise armastust otsimas. Pulmafannist lesk Lisa otsib endale pikaaegset kaasat. Meikar Kiera ihkab olla kellegi esimene valik, kuid ta kardab, et tema perekondlik taust mõjub potentsiaalsetele kaaslastele peletavalt.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Theo ignoreerib Justini nõuannet. Tane muretseb Harperi parast. Elizal on huvitav kollektsioon.

programme.title: Gurmeedetektiiv
programme.desc: Kulinaariaekspert Henry Ross kutsutakse loengut pidama luksuskuurordisse, kus politseiuurija Maggie Price juhtumisi puhkust veedab. Kui aga kuurordist leitakse tuntud ajakirjaniku vagivallatundemarkidega laip, peavad Henry ja Maggie taaskord jõud uhendama ja jarjekordsele vandenõule punkti panema.

programme.title: Valge printsess
programme.desc: Poliitilised valjakutsed on silmapiiril. Kui kuningas Henry leiab end taas lahinguvaljal, et kaitsta oma valitsemisaega, saab Lizzie teada, et nende ees seisvad ohud on kodule lahemal, kui nad arvasid.

programme.title: Poissmees
programme.desc: Clayton suundub uhe õnneliku daamiga Galvestoni kohtingule. Samuti saab Clayton teada, et majas valitsevate pingete allikaks on uks konkreetne daam. Komoodiakuningas Russell Peters togab teisi saates osalejaid.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Omanaoline kohtingusaade, kus valik tehakse aeglaselt paljastuvate alasti kehade põhjal.

programme.title: Valelikud võrgutajad
programme.desc: Valelike võrgutajate Rosewoodis olemise ajal ujub pinnale uus musteerium. Rahutu Aria naeb kahtlane valja ja Emily valetab endiselt oma elu kohta Californias.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Villasse saabub uhe osaleja eks ja see ajab kaardipaki taiesti kaosesse.

programme.title: Majajahtijad
programme.desc: Üksikema palub oma kinnisvaramaaklerist emalt abi, et leida talle ja ta 9-aastasele tutrele Austinis, Texases remonti vajav maja. Kui maja on leitud, uhendavad kolm põlvkonda jõud, et uheskoos kodu renoveerida.

programme.title: Pilvede all
programme.desc: Piret saab kutse konverentsile, kuid uritusest enam huvitab teda hoopis kutsuja. Mari lõpetab suhte Hannoga ja puuab oma koduse elu korda saada. Volts teeb ootamatu katse Piretiga suhet soojendada. Urmas puistab Sirjele sudant, Andres puuab Liinale toeks olla ning Erik palub Kertult abi.

programme.title: Vana silla saladus
programme.desc: Fernando hoiab Julietat mõisas kinni. Carmelo lubab Matíast aidata. Isaac langetab otsuse.

programme.title: Esmakohtingute hotell
programme.desc: Suhteguru Breeny on ise armastust otsimas. Pulmafannist lesk Lisa otsib endale pikaaegset kaasat. Meikar Kiera ihkab olla kellegi esimene valik, kuid ta kardab, et tema perekondlik taust mõjub potentsiaalsetele kaaslastele peletavalt.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Theo ignoreerib Justini nõuannet. Tane muretseb Harperi parast. Elizal on huvitav kollektsioon.

programme.title: Poissmees
programme.desc: Clayton suundub uhe õnneliku daamiga Galvestoni kohtingule. Samuti saab Clayton teada, et majas valitsevate pingete allikaks on uks konkreetne daam. Komoodiakuningas Russell Peters togab teisi saates osalejaid.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: Paarike otsustab kulutada oma miljoni dollarilise lotovõidu, et osta oma pojale unistuste maja, kus ka nemad saaks elada. David peab leidma kõigi vajadustele vastava maja Tennesseees.

programme.title: Kevad sudames
programme.desc: Just siis, kui Katja koos Markiga arajooksnud lehma taga ajab, helistab talle keegi naine ja raagib, et kavatseb end ara tappa. Katja asub kiiresti tegutsema, et leida talle helistanud naine ja teda aidata.

programme.title: Kevad sudames
programme.desc: Judith saab haiglast vastused. Katja julgustab teda Tomiga leppima. Samal ajal on lood tema enda tunnetega vaga segased. Asjale ei tule kasuks ka Marki head suhted uue abilisega.

programme.title: Gurmeedetektiiv
programme.desc: Kulinaariaekspert Henry Ross kutsutakse loengut pidama luksuskuurordisse, kus politseiuurija Maggie Price juhtumisi puhkust veedab. Kui aga kuurordist leitakse tuntud ajakirjaniku vagivallatundemarkidega laip, peavad Henry ja Maggie taaskord jõud uhendama ja jarjekordsele vandenõule punkti panema.

programme.title: Sõbrad
programme.desc: Phoebe abiellub homoseksuaalse Kanada iluuisutajaga, et see toolooa saaks. Ross otsib Rachelilt abi, kuidas Juliega voodis olla.

programme.title: Reede ÕHTU!
programme.desc: Õhtu meeskond eesotsas saatejuhtide Pireti, Juri ja Robiga muudavad nadalavahetuse eelõhtud veelgi mangulisemaks, poorasemaks ja lõbusamaks. Reede ÕHTU! paneb toonadalale lustlikult punkti ja juhatab meeleolukalt sisse nadalavahetuse.

programme.title: Esmakohtingute hotell
programme.desc: 62-aastane Fiona otsib kedagi erilist, kes suudaks labi murda tema karmist esmamuljest. Kokk James soovib vurtsitada oma armuelu ning kohtub naitleja Jamiega, kes on tudinenud teatrimaailma pealiskaudsusest. Hooldekodu juhataja Hayley unistab enesekindlast viikingist, kuid tema ebaharilikud kusimused võivad mõjuda potentsiaalsetele kaasadele eemaletõukavalt.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Cashi ja Remi vahel on jatkuvalt pingeid. Rool on Elizaga raskusi. Sonny planeerib pidu.

programme.title: Gurmeedetektiiv
programme.desc: Politseiuurija Maggie Price ja kulinaariaekspert Henry Ross uurivad Henry hea sõbra kahtlast surmajuhtumit. Oma koogis elutult leitud mehe surma asjaolude uurimine vallandab aga ohtliku sundmusteahela, mis ahvardab saatuslikuks saada nii Henry ja Maggie karjaarile kui ka nende tarkavale suhtele.

programme.title: Valge printsess
programme.desc: Lizzie tegeleb oma ema trotsliku puudega Yorki võimu taastada ja Burgundias ilmub valja poiss, kes vaidab end olevat noore printsi - need sundmused kõigutavad kuningas Henry valitsemist veelgi.

programme.title: Poissmees
programme.desc: Clayton peab valima Genevievei ja Shanae vahel. Armastuseotsing viib noored Horvaatiasse, kus uks daamidest paljastab ootamatu saladuse. Teised uritavad uksteist samal ajal ruutellike valjakutsega roosi nimel ule trumbata.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Omanaoline kohtingusaade, kus valik tehakse aeglaselt paljastuvate alasti kehade põhjal.

programme.title: Valelikud võrgutajad
programme.desc: Valelikud võrgutajad leiavad end juba tuttavast Rosewoodi politseijaoskonnast. Hanna kasutab Lucast alibina. Emily raagib lõpuks tõtt selle kohta, mis tema elus viimased viis aastat toimunud on.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Armastusesaar hõlmab gruppi võitslejaid, keda nimetatakse saarlasteks. Nad elavad valismaailmast eraldatuna Mallorca villas ja on pideva videovalve all. Villas ellujaamiseks peavad saarlased olema paaris mõne teise saarlasega ning sooritama erinevaid valjakutseid. Võitnud paar saab endale 56 000 eurot.

programme.title: Majajahtijad
programme.desc: Californias Silver Lakei uurikorteris elav paar on valmis paris oma maja ostma, kuid neil on absoluutselt erinev maitse. Kui nad suudavad lõpuks maja osas kokku leppida, seisavad nad silmitsi suure remondiga, et saada endale oma unistuste kodu.

programme.title: Pilvede all
programme.desc: Piret satub piinlikku olukorda, kuid suudab sellest hoolimata jalle armuda. Kertu ja Liina kohtumine on kõike muud kui sõbralik. Mari teeb lõpuks otsuse ja Indrek kolib koju tagasi. Gunnar satub ootamatult haiglasse ja Sirje naeb selles võimalust katte maksta.

programme.title: Vana silla saladus
programme.desc: Julieta ja Saúl on Fernando suhtes kahevahel. Carmelo uritab Adelat igati kaitsta. Severo kuuleb halbu uudiseid.

programme.title: Esmakohtingute hotell
programme.desc: 62-aastane Fiona otsib kedagi erilist, kes suudaks labi murda tema karmist esmamuljest. Kokk James soovib vurtsitada oma armuelu ning kohtub naitleja Jamiega, kes on tudinenud teatrimaailma pealiskaudsusest. Hooldekodu juhataja Hayley unistab enesekindlast viikingist, kuid tema ebaharilikud kusimused võivad mõjuda potentsiaalsetele kaasadele eemaletõukavalt.

programme.title: New Yorgi mõrvad
programme.desc: Ühe New Yorgi vanima restorani populaarne Maitre D Roger Brooks leitakse surnuna oma korterist. Uurijad avastavad ohvri varjatud kulje ja võimalike teiste ohvrite olemasolu.

programme.title: Laskur
programme.desc: Selleks, et oma peret paasta, peab Bob Lee korraldama ohtliku vahetuskauba. Nadineil on raskusi, et leida tasakaalu oma ustavuse vahel Bob Lee ja FBI vastu. Isaac sõlmib vabaduse nimel lepingu.

programme.title: Suvereporter
programme.desc: Sadagu vihma või siragu paike! Suvereporter toob televaatajani kõige olulisemad uudised ja mahlakamad palad Eestimaa erinevaist paigust, nii maalt kui merelt, festivalidelt ja sundmustelt, aga ka Tartu mnt Meediamaja rõdult ning Fahle troopiliselt tanavagaleriilt. Saadet juhivad Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Võmmid
programme.desc: Teetõketega tabatakse varastatud kolimiskaubik ja ukski vale ei suuda politseid kõigutada. Ootamatult puksata tabatud kahtlusalune ei jõua isegi oma narkot ara peita.

programme.title: Võmmid
programme.desc: Kahtlusalune unustab lahkuda parast parklasse sisse murdmist. Rahatuli lõpeb vandaalitsemisega. Narkoga vahelejaanud kurjategijad uritavad taas valjamõeldud lugude abil paaseda.

programme.title: Ämblikmees
programme.desc: Innovatiivse ja võimsaid eriefekte armastava režissoori Sam Raimi ("Lohista mind põrgusse") kahele Oscarile kandideerinud fantaasiakullane seiklusfilm, mis põhineb samanimelisel koomiksil. Peter Parker (Tobey Maguire, "Vennad") on tavaline nohiklik ja endassetõmbunud koolipoiss. Kui Peterit hammustab geneetiliselt muundatud amblik, tekivad temas uleloomulikud võimed. Kui noormehe peret tabab õnnetus, peab ta asuma oma võimeid kasutama ja temast saab kurjusega võitlev superkangelane - Ämblikmees. Filmis mangivad veel Kirsten Dunst ("Marie Antoinette"), James Franco ("127 tundi"), Willem Dafoe ("Antikristus") jt.

programme.title: Murka
programme.desc: Seiklussari viib vaataja meelelahutuslikule teekonnale, mille kestel kaib saatejuht Marko Kaljuveer koos eesti aegade edukaima korvpalluri Martin Muursepaga labi Murka profikarjaari rajad nii Venemaal, Rootsis, Iisraelis, Kreekas kui USA-s ning kutsub tahtede mangule oma Euroopa meistritest, karikavõitjatest, NBA-lastest kui olumpialastest vanu võitluskaaslasi. Esimeses osas kulastab Murka oma sõpru Valentin Kubrakovi ja Aleksei Savrasenkot. Venemaal olles tuleb muuhulgas minna ka seiklusrikkale kalaretkele. Mis tapsemalt õngekonksu otsa satub ning kes meestest suurema saagi kogub, naete juba saatesarja avaosas.

programme.title: Murka
programme.desc: Martin Muursepp jatkab seiklust Venemaal ning parast kerget trenni spordihallis siirdub koos sõprade Valja ja Savrassiga Krasnodari ooelu uudistama. Õhtu lõpeb eliitklubis, kus sõpradele jaab ullatuslikult pihku karaokemikker. Tippsport, vaba aeg ja lõõgastumine tõstatavad mõistagi paljude jaoks valusa teema - alkohol ning selle võimalik laastav mõju.

programme.title: Võmmid
programme.desc: Teetõketega tabatakse varastatud kolimiskaubik ja ukski vale ei suuda politseid kõigutada. Ootamatult puksata tabatud kahtlusalune ei jõua isegi oma narkot ara peita.

programme.title: Võmmid
programme.desc: Kahtlusalune unustab lahkuda parast parklasse sisse murdmist. Rahatuli lõpeb vandaalitsemisega. Narkoga vahelejaanud kurjategijad uritavad taas valjamõeldud lugude abil paaseda.

programme.title: Rikas Eesti
programme.desc: Seekordses osas uurib Robert Rool, miks kolis Ghana juurtega Kymbali Londonist Eesti vaikseimasse linna Mõisakulla. Lisaks saame teada, kuidas kõlavad Kymbali esituses meie rahvalaulud ning mis emotsioone tekitab temas Wittensteini Ajakeskuses pakutav seakarss.

programme.title: Suvereporter
programme.desc: Sadagu vihma või siragu paike! Suvereporter toob televaatajani kõige olulisemad uudised ja mahlakamad palad Eestimaa erinevaist paigust, nii maalt kui merelt, festivalidelt ja sundmustelt, aga ka Tartu mnt Meediamaja rõdult ning Fahle troopiliselt tanavagaleriilt. Saadet juhivad Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Bud otsustab sõita koos sõpradega kevadvaheajal Floridasse, aga Kelly ja ta sõbrannad petavad neilt piletid valja.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Kelly osaleb bikiinikonkursil, mille peaauhinnaks on 10 000 dollarit. Peakohtunikeks on Al, Jefferson ja Griff, kes puuavad varjata, et nad Kellyt tunnevad.

programme.title: New Yorgi mõrvad
programme.desc: Ühe New Yorgi vanima restorani populaarne Maitre D Roger Brooks leitakse surnuna oma korterist. Uurijad avastavad ohvri varjatud kulje ja võimalike teiste ohvrite olemasolu.

programme.title: Kohtuekspertiis
programme.desc: Vaatajani tuuakse 22-aastase Helen McCourti traagiline juhtum, kes uhel ool oma kodulinnas bussist maha astus, kuid koju ei jõudnudki.

programme.title: Palgamõrv
programme.desc: Kas roimadest lummatud kirjaniku sungeimad fantaasiad võivad hakata tegelikkuseks saama? Isehakanud romaannikirjaniku plaan oma abikaasa elukuunla enneaegseks kusutamiseks võtab ootamatu poorde ning varitsusoperatsioon toob võika tõe paevavalgele.

programme.title: Võmmid
programme.desc: Äsja vangist vabanenud kahtlusalune saadetakse narkootikumide parast taas trellide taha. Armastusemasina-nimeline mootorratas on kadunud ja keegi pole sellega rahul.

programme.title: Võmmid
programme.desc: Politseijuhid peatavad roovi, millele jargneb dramaatiline tagaajamine. Politseinikud peatavad varastatud veoauto ja peavad muuhulgas valja selgitama, kuidas õnnestub autot koduvõtmega kaima panna.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Plaanitud matk Utah magedes lõkkeõhtute ja rannakutega muutub uleoo halvaks unenaoks - vennad Trammelid roovivad Alexi.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Kui IRA radikaalne tiib plaanib Belfasti rahukõnelused lõpedada, astub vahele Adam McGuire. Ameerikas aga ootavad meest ees vaenuliku grupeeringu liikmed, kes roovivad tema tutre.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: C.D. kingib Walkerile sunnipaevaks Hayes Cooperi noorusaastate paevaraamatu ja jutustab loo, kuidas Cooper peatas bandiitide kolmiku, kel oli plaanis runnata mormoonidest uusasunikke Utah magedes 19. sajandil.

programme.title: New Yorgi mõrvad
programme.desc: Kui noor pankur kaob, taastab politsei tema elu viimased hetked. See viib nad professionaalini, kes pole uldse selline, nagu ta valja paistab.

programme.title: Kohtuekspertiis
programme.desc: Naistetapja jaab tabamatuks ule 30 aasta, kuni tehnoloogia areng võimaldab kriminalistidel leida sundmuskohalt tõendi, mis saab mõrvarile saatuslikuks.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Al otsustab Luckyle kuudi ehitada, aga Marcy poolt talle kaela saadetud inspektor teatab, et see ei vasta nõuetele.

programme.desc: Oscariga parjatud megahitt Peterist, kes suudab kehastuda uli-inimlike võimetega Ämblikmeheks. Tema uueks vastaseks saab andekas teadlane, kes muutub õnnetuse tagajarjel teraskombitsatega maniakiks. Kustunud pole ka Peteri tunded kauni Mary Janei vastu ja see nõrkus võib talle saatuslikuks saada...

programme.desc: Peredraama võtab surmava poorde, kui tõrjutud amm palub maffiasidemetega vanal sõbral ta minia tappa.

programme.desc: Kui noor pankur kaob, taastab politsei tema elu viimased hetked. See viib nad professionaalini, kes pole uldse selline, nagu ta valja paistab.

programme.desc: Bob Lee, Julie, Nadine ja Isaac peavad tegutsema koos, et paaseda Vene saatkonda, paasta Mary, takistada vandenõu elluviimist ja kõrvaldada viimased vandenõulased ning viimaks lõplikult Bob Lee suutust tõestada.

programme.title: Murka
programme.desc: Martin Muursepp jatkab seiklust Venemaal ja siirdub pealinna Moskvasse, kus kaib ara saunas ja oma kunagise koduklubi CSKA suurejoonelises kompleksis, kuhu filmima paasemiseks andis loa kaitseminister isiklikult. Lisaks nõukaaegse noortekoondise esimesele toakaaslasele Zahar Pashutinile, kohtub Murka ka hea sõbra Anton Judiniga ning legendaarse treeneri Stanislav Jerjominiga, kes paljastab põhjused, miks ta eesti pallurit niivõrd kõrgelt hindab.

programme.title: Murka
programme.desc: Tanases osas reisib Martin Muursepp koos saatejuht Marko Kaljuveeriga muu hulgas Rootsi ja meenutab keerulist lapsepõlve. Emaga kasvanud andeka korvpallipoisi treeninglaagrid nõukogude noortekoondises jatsid jalje koolitoole, samuti avaldasid negatiivset mõju kahtlased sõbrad. Paastev võimalus avanes siis, kui Martin sai õe juurde Rootsi sõita ja oma esimesest valisklubi palgast hakkas ka ema toetama. Ema ja õe kõrval saavad saates sõna ka lati endine korvpallur Roberts Štelmahers ja Leedu korvpallilegend Valdemaras Chomičius.

programme.desc: Walker peab appi tõttama piiriaarse Mournfuli vaikelinna elanikele, keda hoiab oma võimu all linnakese erif Bell.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Tegelik mõrvar lavastab Dallase politseiniku tapmises suudi Carlose vennapoja.

programme.title: New Yorgi mõrvad
programme.desc: Kui tapetakse tuntud ja armastatud Queensi gei, sulandub NYPD uurija geikogukonda, et mõrvar tabada.

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Dr Mark Weinberg kadus jaljetult ja ta abikaasal Michelle Krameril pole õrna aimugi, mis temast sain. Weinbergeri juhtum on sunge ja võigas lugu ahnusest ja võimust, mis paneb Michellei pisaraid valama ja terve linnakese õõva tundma. Ta on Ameerika tagaotsitavaim "põgenev tohter".

programme.title: Palgamõrv
programme.desc: Peredraama võtab surmava poorde, kui tõrjutud amm palub maffiasidemetega vanal sõbral ta minia tappa.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Kelly laheb kohtama poisiga, kes tahab talle oma tudruku parast katte maksta.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Bud peab lõpueksamiteks valmistuma, aga kaib samal ajal kuuma tudrukuga ja seks segab õppimist.

programme.title: Ämblikmees 3
programme.desc: Peter Parker on lõpuks saavutanud tasakaalu oma armastatu MJ ja superkangelase kohustuste vahel. Aga eemalt on lahenemas torm. Samal ajal, kui rahvas imetleb Ämblikmeest, puuab Peteri tahelepanu Gwen Stacy, kellest saab tanu poisi liigsele enesekindlusele MJ jaoks tõsine rivaal. Ämblikmees peab samas astuma vastu kahele eriti ohtlikule vastasele, kelle tohutu jõud ja piiritu tasumisjanu seavad ohtu Peteri ja kõik, kes talle kallid on.

programme.title: Palgamõrv
programme.desc: Tunnustatud silmakirurg laseb oma IT-mehel leida vene palgamõrvar, kes uhe ta endise tootaja ara tapaks. Loo arenedes otsustab ta aga sihtmarki muuta.

programme.title: New Yorgi mõrvad
programme.desc: Kui tapetakse tuntud ja armastatud Queensi gei, sulandub NYPD uurija geikogukonda, et mõrvar tabada.

programme.title: Laskur
programme.desc: Bob Lee Swagger ja ta naine Julie uhinevad Bobi endise merejalavae uksusega Saksamaal ning paasevad vaevu terroristlikust runnakust. FBI agent Nadine Memphis asub toole Washingtonis koos Patricia Gregsoniga.

programme.title: Suvereporter
programme.desc: Sadagu vihma või siragu paike! Suvereporter toob televaatajani kõige olulisemad uudised ja mahlakamad palad Eestimaa erinevaist paigust, nii maalt kui merelt, festivalidelt ja sundmustelt, aga ka Tartu mnt Meediamaja rõdult ning Fahle troopiliselt tanavagaleriilt. Saadet juhivad Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Võmmid
programme.desc: Turvamehi ahvardatakse "tabamatu" relvaga. Kaasreisija viskab auto aknast valja kahtlase koti ja sellel on fataalsed tagajarjed.

programme.title: Murka
programme.desc: Tanases osas sõidab Martin Muursepp kulla lõunanaabritele. Riia loomaaias kohtume kunagise nõukogude noortekoondise kaaslase Roberts Štelmahersiga, kelle jaoks on Murka selgelt uhe paindliku elusolendi moodi. Vilniuses aga raagib Leedu korvpalli elav legend ja Martini endine treener Valdemaras Chomičius millist potentsiaali ta meie korvpalluris nagi.

programme.title: Murka
programme.desc: Tanases osas jõuab kadunud poeg Martin Muursepp viimaks korvpalli unelmate liiga NBA ruppe tagasi. Kunagine koduklubi Dallas Mavericks võtab teda vastu aarmiselt soojalt. Murkat ja temaga USA-s koos reisivat meeskonnakaaslast Chris Ansteyt tulevad embama teiste hulgas ka sakslasest NBA superstaar, juba 20 hooaega Dallase sargis manginud Dirk Nowitzki, kunagine võitluskaaslane Michael Finley ja praegune peatreener Rick Carlisle. Murka on kodus!

programme.title: Võmmid
programme.desc: Turvamehi ahvardatakse "tabamatu" relvaga. Kaasreisija viskab auto aknast valja kahtlase koti ja sellel on fataalsed tagajarjed.

programme.title: Rikas Eesti
programme.desc: Tanases saates tutvub Juri Kolumbiast parit Eduardiga, kes tunneb suurt huvi meie setu kultuuri vastu. Kuid kuidas saab Kolumbia noormees hakkama setude keskkonnas, kus on aukohal sõir ja 60-kraadine "hansa"?

programme.title: Suvereporter

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Peakorterist saadetakse personaliosakonna esindaja ja jurist uurima Scrantoni haru seksuaalse ahistamise põhimõtteid. Michael kardab, et see teeb lõpu kontoris lõõpimisele.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Michael valmistub korterit ostma, kuid satub selleks vajaliku laenu tõttu stressi. Sekretar Pam ja muugimees Jim leiutavad igavusest kontoriolumpia erinevate aladega.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack laheb Washingtoni, et vastata kusimustele GE kohta ja avastab, et tema vana vaenlane Devon Banks juhib uurimist. Samal ajal leiavad Jenna ja Tracy uusi viise, kuidas karistada Lizi uute talentide otsimise eest.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack sunnib Lizi reisima temaga Georgiasse, et leida uusi talente, kes esindavad "tõelist" Ameerikat. Tracy kardab, et ta on kuulsuste "kolme reegli" ohver, ja Jenna sõbruneb stsenaristidega.

programme.desc: Christy on uksikema, kes parast alkoholismi ja narkosõltuvusega võitlemist otsutab teha oma elule restardi. Ta alustab tood ettekandjana, kaib korraparaselt AA kohtumistel kohal ning elu tundub õigel teel olevat, kuniks tema ellu ja majja trugib tagasi tema ema Bonnie.

programme.desc: Uuriv telesaade "Inside Probe" uurib krabirestorani omaniku kadumist.

programme.title: Minu nimi on Earl
programme.desc: Teises osas ilmnevad krabirestoran omaniku kadumise kohta uued ullatavad paljastused.

programme.title: Bioloogia kursus
programme.desc: Jack kasutab Lynetteile mulje avaldamiseks Michellei iga-aastast mõrvamusteeriumipidu. Meeleheitel õpilased tungivad Whitlocki keskkooli, et varastada A.P. Bio eksamimaterjalid.

programme.title: Bioloogia kursus
programme.desc: Jacki sõda naabriga jõuab poordepunkti, kui see ahvardab rikkuda kohtingu Lynetteiga. Kui koolifotograaf oma hinda tõstab, võtab Durbin koolipiltide tegemise enda katte.

programme.title: Kõik armastavad Raymondit
programme.desc: Frank raagib Allyle, et kuna Ray ei kai kirikus, tuleb tal põrgusse minna. Rayl tekivad suumepiinad, kuna Frank on olnud alati hea eeskuju, ja ta otsustab hakata korralikuks koguduseliikmeks.

programme.title: Kõik armastavad Raymondit
programme.desc: Robert saab harjalt puskida ja peab mõneks ajaks Marie ning Franki juurde jaama.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Michael ja Dwight vaidlevad, kumb neist kasitsivõitluses peale jaaks, ja korraldavadki duelli. Kui Michael võidab, edutab ta Dwighti lohutuseks abipiirkonnajuhtiks.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Michael ja kirderegiooni asepresident Jan Levinson kohtuvad tahtsa kliendiga. Michael suudabki kliendiga hea sideme tekitada ja lepingu sõlmida. Kontoris leiavad tootajad Michaeli kirjutatud filmistsenaariumi.

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.desc: Charlie avastab, et tal on kõik laenud maksmata, sest raamatupidaja ei saa asjadega hakkama. Samas on tal raske oma luksuslikust elustiilist loobuda ning emalt raha laenamine naib suisa võimatu.

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.desc: Charlie ja Alan tutvuvad Frankie, seksika, ent pealtnaha pustihullu naisega. Alan armub temasse silmapilk ja ka Charlie pole paris tundetu.

programme.title: Sõbrad
programme.desc: Ross paljastab, et kohtumine Racheliga on tal videolindil. Monica ja Chandler tutvusid mesinadalatel toreda paariga, kuid avastavad, et pole ise nii head muljet jatnud.

programme.title: Sõbrad
programme.desc: Phoebe hakkab kaima uhe Monica alluvaga ja tahab poisi samal paeval maha jatta, kui Monica ta vallandada kavatseb. Joey saadab Racheli uhe oma kaastahega kohtama.

programme.title: Minu nimi on Earl
programme.desc: Joy raagib Earlile, et Little Chubby on Dodgei isa, ja kui Earl Little Chubbyle seda utleb, muudab ta Earli elu põrguks.

programme.title: Minu nimi on Earl
programme.desc: Earl Hickey on pisisuli, kes jaab auto alla ja kaotab loteriipileti 100 tuhandele dollarile.Nuud asub ta karmavõlga heastama. Rohtude mõju all allkirjastab ta lahtutuspaberid ning alustab vigade heastamist Kennyst.

programme.title: Ema
programme.desc: Christy on uksikema, kes parast alkoholismi ja narkosõltuvusega võitlemist otsutab teha oma elule restardi. Ta alustab tood ettekandjana, kaib korraparaselt AA kohtumistel kohal ning elu tundub õigel teel olevat, kuniks tema ellu ja majja trugib tagasi tema ema Bonnie.

programme.desc: Liz puuab sundida uurniku valja kolima, et saada tema korter endale, Jack ja Tracy kaaluvad vasektoomia tegemist ja Kennethile pannakse kohustus muuta kontor keskkonnasõbralikumaks.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Asjad muutuvad, kui Liz alustab oma uut jutusaadet "Dealbreakers" ja kogeb, mida tahendab olla Jenna olukorras. Jack, kellele Devon avaldab survet, arvutab valja, kuidas muuta "Dealbreakers" edukaks. Tracy võtab ette Hollywoodi valjakutse, et tõestada oma puhendumust oma naisele.
